name: @zhongbr/code-sandbox
description: Display JSX Code demos in your web pages easily.

scripts.main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./dist vite build
scripts.build:main: tsc && pnpm run build:iframe && pnpm run main
scripts.webcomponent: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/webcomponent.tsx FORMATS=umd FILE_NAME=webcomponent OUT=./webcomponent vite build
scripts.build:webcomponent: tsc && pnpm run build:iframe && pnpm run webcomponent
scripts.build:iframe: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=src/iframe/iframe.ts FORMATS=es FILE_NAME=iframe OUT=./iframe vite build
scripts.build: tsc && pnpm run build:iframe && pnpm run main && pnpm run webcomponent
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=sandbox-development TARGET=src/index.tsx FORMATS=es,umd FILE_NAME=main OUT=./dist vite serve

author: zhongbr<zhongbr@icloud.com>(https://zhongbr.cn)
